/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings that line the roads are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
